question: The recently launched Intensified Mission Indradhanush (IMI) aims to immunise all those pregnant women who have been left unimmunized and every child in the country below the age of _?
explanation: The recently launched Intensified Mission Indradhanush (IMI) aims to immunise all those pregnant women who have been left unimmunized and every child in the country below the age of two years. The mission will focus on improving immunization coverage in select districts and cities to ensure full immunization to more than 90% by December 2018. The achievement of full immunisation under earlier launched Mission Indradhanush was to cover at-least 90% coverage was to be achieved by 2020 earlier.
